code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{loginUser}from'./../../apiCalls/auth';import{toast}from'react-hot-toast';import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{hideLoader,showLoader}from"../../redux/loaderSlice";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const dispatch=useDispatch();const[user,setUser]=React.useState({email:'',password:''});async function onFormSubmit(event){event.preventDefault();let response=null;try{dispatch(showLoader());response=await loginUser(user);dispatch(hideLoader());if(response.success){toast.success(response.message);localStorage.setItem('token',response.token);window.location.href="/";}else{toast.error(response.message);}}catch(error){dispatch(hideLoader());toast.error(response.message);}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container-back-img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container-back-color"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card_title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Login Here"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"form",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:onFormSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:user.email,onChange:e=>setUser({...user,email:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:user.password,onChange:e=>setUser({...user,password:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Login"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card_terms",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Don't have an account yet?",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/signup",children:"Signup Here"})]})})]})]});}export default Login;
